metadata.Title: CVE-2020-27418 on Ubuntu 23.04 (lunar) - medium
metadata.Description: A Use After Free vulnerability in Fedora Linux kernel 5.9.0-rc9 allowsattackers to obatin sensitive information via vgacon_invert_region()function.

criterions.comment: linux-kvm package in lunar is affected and may need fixing.
linux-allwinner: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of life').
linux-aws package in lunar is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure package in lunar is affected and may need fixing.
linux-gcp package in lunar is affected and may need fixing.
linux-ibm: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of life, was needs-triage').
linux-lowlatency package in lunar is affected and may need fixing.
linux-oracle package in lunar is affected and may need fixing.
linux-raspi package in lunar is affected and may need fixing.
linux-starfive package in lunar is affected and may need fixing.
